Last week, Maddison and Tielemanns created [2v1] against Jorginho behind the Chelsea midfield and today, it's Cantwell and Buendia who are doing the same exact thing. Chelsea's shape is often 4-1-4-1 as Kovacic moves up and that leaves Jorginho alone in b/w the lines



Norman
